content: of nine though i wasn t avid about it until i discovered the plethora of free patterns online i m ecstatic to finally be writing my own patterns to share with the community i hope you enjoyed making your own doll base and i d love to see how yours turned out feel v free to share pictures on instagram with me you can tag me using the username kuroviolet_craft also feel free to customize make some accessories or hair or whatever you d like give your doll some personality the poor thing is naked i m looking forward to seeing what you make if you feel like sharing on another note i plan to release multiple expansions for this pattern free of course they will includke hairstyles clothing and the like to make the dolls look like tv show and game characters so keep an eye out for that if you re interested they will not be available on etsy as esty doesn t allow free content so you ll have to download them from ravelry this pattern is for personal use only that means you may not sell distribute or claim this pattern as your own downloading this pattern constitutes agreement of these terms however you may sell the finished product of this pattern though not legally required it is respectful and appreciated to credit the designer of any products you sell © kuroviolet 2022 / nikkie l 2022 7
